public.hotmart_course_lesson_count.definition: select "hotmart_course_modules"."course", count("hotmart_course_lessons"."id") as "count" from "hotmart_course_lessons" left join "hotmart_course_modules" on "hotmart_course_modules"."id" = "hotmart_course_lessons"."module" group by "hotmart_course_modules"."course"
public.hotmart_course_lesson_count.name: hotmart_course_lesson_count

public.youtube_channels_video_count.definition: select "channel", count("id") as "count" from "youtube_channels_videos" group by "youtube_channels_videos"."channel"
public.youtube_channels_video_count.name: youtube_channels_video_count
